Logging train revival from Palmerston North to Hawke’s Bay will help ‘deteriorating’ Napier-Taihape Rd https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/logging-train-revival-from-palmerston-north-to-hawkes-bay-will-help-deteriorating-napier-taihape-rd/ NSGQYZYLYZGQNJOSDAZORSE6CY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/logging-train-revival-from-palmerston-north-to-hawkes-bay-will-help-deteriorating-napier-taihape-rd/ NSGQYZYLYZGQNJOSDAZORSE6CY/ Linda Hall'After some pencil-sharpening, we’ve been able to get this agreement in place.' Mon, 27 Jan 2025 02:33:02 +0000 A new arrangement between Ernslaw One, KiwiRail and Napier Port will see a log train run daily on the Napier-Palmerston North line, five days a week directly to Napier Port.
